source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_SEQ_00<tab>Cyella is not finished with you yet.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_SEQ_00<tab>彷徨う階段亭のサイエラは、何かを思い出しているようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_SEQ_01<tab>Cyella speaks to you of Unukalhai, a fellow lost soul from the Thirteenth shard. Though he formerly served Elidibus, with the emissary gone, he will be wanting for purpose─a feeling Cyella knows all too well. Concerned for the boy's well-being, she asks that you offer him your support when next you meet in the Source.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_SEQ_01<tab>サイエラと話した。彼女は、第十三世界の英雄候補だったウヌクアルハイのことを案じているようだ。石の家の「ウヌクアルハイ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_SEQ_02<tab>You find Unukalhai in the Rising Stones. It seems he too remembers Cyella─who he knows as Cylva─fondly from their meeting after the fall of the Thirteenth, and is indeed at a loose end as she speculated. In light of both of these truths, he wonders if he mightn't seek her counsel as to what course he should pursue next. The two of you ask the opinion of Urianger, who confirms that this could theoretically be accomplished with the use of a spirit vessel, and agrees to perform the necessary magicks.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_SEQ_02<tab>ウヌクアルハイと話した。第一世界での出来事を聞いたウヌクアルハイは、シルヴァと会うために、第一世界に渡ることを望んだ。そのためには、ウリエンジェの力を借りて、ウヌクアルハイの魂をソウル・サイフォンにこめる必要がある。暁の間の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB09E01 /var>」で待機して、ウリエンジェの作業が終わるのを待とう。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_SEQ_03<tab>After only a short wait, Urianger presents you with Unukalhai's spirit vessel. He mentions that transferring the boy into the vessel posed little problem, as he─much like the Ascians with whom you have become so familiar─is a spirit without permanent corporeal form, but cautions you that this very state may pose a problem for Unukalhai at some point in the future.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_SEQ_03<tab>ウリエンジェの作業が終わるのを待って、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E906901 /var>を入手した。クリスタリウムの博物陳列館の「ベーク＝ラグ」に、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E906901 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_SEQ_04<tab>After crossing to the First, you seek out Beq Lugg. Though they are a bit put out by your recklessness in bringing another soul across the rift, they confirm that they can draw Unukalhai from the vessel and reconstitute him. At your insistence, they also agree to meet you at the Wandering Stairs when the task is accomplished, that you might drop a hint to Cyella in the meantime.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_SEQ_04<tab>ベーク＝ラグに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E906901 /var>を渡した。クリスタリウムの彷徨う階段亭の「サイエラ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_SEQ_05<tab>You keep Cyella waiting in suspense for longer than intended before Beq Lugg and Unukalhai make their appearance. When the discussion turns to the history of the Thirteenth, he wonders aloud if it might not be possible to restore balance to that world in the same way you did for the First. Beq Lugg suggests that a thorough understanding of the state of affairs there is necessary to truly know one way or the other. For that, however, you will need to open a gate to the void.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_SEQ_05<tab>サイエラと話していると、ウヌクアルハイとベーク＝ラグが合流した。ベーク＝ラグの提案により、第十三世界の観測を試みることになった。彷徨う階段亭の「テイナー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_SEQ_06<tab>Taynor, resident expert on hollows and the creation thereof, is thankfully not far away, and Unukalhai wastes no time in asking him if he can open a voidgate. Taynor is initially reticent, pointing out that he is unable to perform a spell of the necessary power without assistance, and that it took him and Nyelbert years of training before they were able to do any such thing─but Cyella suggests that Unukalhai use his talent to intuit via aether the memories and emotions that remain in Nyelbert's crystal. This enables him to understand much of what is required for the technique, as well as how badly Nyelbert wanted to save Taynor from his accidental exile. Moved by his friend's dedication, Taynor is inspired to join hands with Unukalhai and put the power to create hollows to good use at last.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_SEQ_06<tab>テイナーと話した。ウヌクアルハイは、次元の狭間を開くための修行を行うことになった。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Unukalhai in the Rising Stones.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TODO_00<tab>石の家のウヌクアルハイと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TODO_01<tab>Find a decent spot to await Urianger's return.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB09E01 /var>で待機

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TODO_02<tab>Deliver Unukalhai's spirit vessel to Beq Lugg at the Cabinet of Curiosity.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TODO_02<tab>博物陳列館のベーク＝ラグに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E906901 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Cyella.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TODO_03<tab>サイエラと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Taynor.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TODO_04<tab>テイナーと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_001<tab>Seeing the lot of you together like that─it reminds me of the old days. Ardbert and the rest, drinking and bickering and laughing... Drove each other half-mad at times, but there was never any question of who'd be there when times got tough.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_001君と賞金稼ぎたちを見ていて、ふと思い出したんだ。
アルバートたち「光の戦士」もまた互いを信じ、
足りないところを補い合っていた、と。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_002<tab>Can't help but wonder, can I? If I'd had companions like that back home, could it have been saved?
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_002私にもそんな仲間がいれば……
あるいは第十三世界での戦いで故郷を守ることが……。
いや、仮定の話をしても仕方がない。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_003<tab>I'm not the only one who tried, though each of us stood alone. There was Unukalhai...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_003……そういえば、君はたしか、
「ウヌクアルハイ」とも面識があったはずだな？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A1_000_001<tab>We've met. He was working with Elidibus at the time.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A1_000_001<tab>エリディブスの使いだった少年か？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A1_000_002<tab>That nigh-unpronounceable name sounds familiar...
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A1_000_002<tab>誰だっけ……？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_005<tab>Yes... He, too, was one would-be savior of the Thirteenth, and was spared his fated demise by Ascian devices.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_005そうだ。
私と同様に第十三世界の英雄候補であり、
死すべき定めから、エリディブスによって救われた少年だ。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_006<tab>Another would-be savior of the Thirteenth─a young man. He was plucked from the jaws of death by Elidibus, and last I knew, had gone to the Source to serve as his herald.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_006私と同様に第十三世界の英雄候補であり、
死すべき定めから、エリディブスによって救われた少年だ。
その使いとして原初世界に渡ったはずだが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_007<tab>We spoke once, after the destruction of our world. If the others could be saved, we thought, we yet had parts to play.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_007死の淵から引き上げられた後、彼とは語り合ったものさ。
せめて、ほかの世界の命は救ってみせようと……
異なる世界で、使命を果たそうとな。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_008<tab>What he's up to now that Elidibus is gone, though, I have no idea. Has he found himself a new role, as I have? Or does he feel as adrift as we were back then?
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_008とにかく、かつての主であるエリディブスが封じられたいま、
彼がどうしているものかと、気になってね。
私のように新たな使命を見つけていれば良いのだが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_009<tab>If you encounter him in the Source, I ask that you help him find a way forward─just as you have helped all of us here.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_009もしよかったら、君が原初世界に戻ったときにでも、
彼の想いを聞いて、相談に乗ってやってくれると嬉しい。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_050<tab>Well met, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. What brings you here today?
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_050お久しぶりですね。
僕に何かご用ですか？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_051<tab>Urianger did apprise me of your travels in the First. And of what became of Elidibus, at long last...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_051……貴方が第一世界に渡った後の顛末は、
ウリエンジェから報告を受けていましたが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_052<tab>But I was not aware that you were working with Cylva.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_052<tab>まさか、彼女とも出会っていようとは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_053<tab>I consider her a comrade of sorts, though our time together was short. Looking upon the twisted remains of the world you tried to save creates a bond that few can understand.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_053僕は彼女を同じ境遇の仲間だと思っています。
生前は互いの存在を知らずに、それぞれが破滅に抗い、
そして破れてしまったわけですが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_054<tab>At that time, we spoke of what we could hope to achieve with our newfound immortality...and of our regrets.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_054死の淵からアシエンによって引き上げられ、
次元の狭間にて「不滅なる者」として出会ったのです。
そして、同じ後悔と希望を共有した……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_055<tab>Though I then believed what had happened to be the natural result of my age and inexperience, I now think this was merely the least painful explanation I could offer myself.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_055僕は、かつて世界を救えなかった原因を、
幼さゆえの力不足であると語りましたが……違いますね。
それは自分をだますための方便だ。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_056<tab>Cylva is right─we ought to have sought each other out before it was too late.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_056彼女の言うとおり、第一世界の英雄たちのように、
互いに背中を預け合える仲間がいれば、僕たちも、あるいは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_057<tab>I would not make the same mistake again. With the Warring Triad gone, I am indeed in need of new purpose. But to seek it alone is folly.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_057三闘神との戦いが終わってから、僕はずっと考えていたんです。
世界を救う英雄となるべく、自分にできることは何なのか、と。
シルヴァに会うことができれば、その答えが見つかるような気がする。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_058<tab>I should like to speak with Cylva─assuming such a thing is possible. As I mentioned, she understands how I feel more than any other.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_058<tab>どうにかして、第一世界に渡る方法はないのでしょうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_Q2_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A2_000_001<tab>There may be a way...
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A2_000_001<tab>ソウル・サイフォンを使えば……

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A2_000_002<tab>Of course. All I require is <var 1A 02 /var>your soul<var 1A 01 /var>...
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A2_000_002<tab>賢人たちのように魂だけなら……

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_060<tab>You speak of the spirit vessel, correct? The means by which the Scions returned to the Source.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_060魂と記憶を保存する魔具、ソウル・サイフォン。
賢人たちは、それを使って原初世界へ戻ってきたのですね。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_100_060<tab>If I understand the principles at work correctly, then it was a near miracle that you succeeded in bringing them back without killing them.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_100_060貴方の話を聞く限りでは、ソウル・サイフォンがあろうとも、
賢人たちが世界を移動できたのは、奇跡に近い所業に思えます。
通常であれば、再現するのは不可能でしょう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_200_060<tab>If Elidibus is to be believed, however, my current state makes me something of an exception in matters of life and death!
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_200_060ですが「エリディブス」によって、
「不死性」を得ている僕ならば、あるいは……！

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_300_060<tab>In which case, there is naught to be lost from making the attempt. Please, say you'll help.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_300_060)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、どうかお願いします！
僕に力を貸していただけないでしょうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_Q2_100_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_Q2_100_000<tab>どうする？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A2_100_001<tab>We need an expert in spirit vessels.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A2_100_001<tab>ウリエンジェに連絡する

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A2_100_002<tab>I have absolutely no idea what I'm doing!
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A2_100_002<tab>ソウル・サイフォンと言えば……

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_061<tab>Pray forgive the delay. Thou didst seek my council?
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_061お待たせいたしました。
事情が事情だけに、急ぎ会うべきかと思い、
馳せ参じた次第ですが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_062<tab>Aye, the gifts granted young Unukalhai by Hydaelyn and the Ascians may prove a boon in easing the transition.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_062ふむ……。
確かに、この少年には「超える力」があり、
アシエンから「不滅なる者」として転生する術も学んでいる……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_063<tab>However, I know not to what extent, nor what might befall thy spirit should it be lost betwixt worlds.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_063ですが、それでも無事に世界を渡ることができる保証はありません。
失敗すれば、あなたの魂がどうなるか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_064<tab>Nevertheless...I know that this is my path forward. Please, Urianger.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_064それでも、第一世界へ行かなければならないんです！
英雄となるべく、僕にできることを探すために！
だからウリエンジェ……どうか！！

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_065<tab>Very well. If thou believest that thou shalt find new purpose in the First, I will do all in my power to see thee safely there.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_065あなたなりの生きる道を探すためならば、
喜んで協力させていただきましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_066<tab>We shall be but a few moments. Mayhap a worthy tome might keep thee occupied whilst I perform the necessary magicks?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_066<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんは、こちらでお待ちください。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_070<tab>Obviously the boy can't take up work in a tavern, but there must be some means to start him toward a new goal.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_070この酒場で、英雄の語り部となった私のように、
彼にも、生きる理由のようなものが見つかっていれば良いのだが。
ウヌクアルハイの想いを聞いてやってもらえないだろうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_100<tab>'Tis done. Pray guard his vessel well.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_100お待たせいたしました。
処置はつつがなく終わりましたよ。
これで、あの少年の魂を第一世界へと運ぶことができます。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_101<tab>Unukalhai is as I and the other Scions were on the First─a soul with form, yet no true body. Thus 'twas a simple matter to transfer him to the vessel using the selfsame process as before.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_101彼は、いわば第一世界での私たちのように、魂を実体化させた存在。
ゆえに、ソウル・サイフォンと相性が良かったのでしょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_102<tab>To withdraw his essence once across the rift ought to prove similarly straightforward. However...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_102第一世界へと運んだ後は、ソウル・サイフォンから魂を取りだし、
ふたたび実体化させる必要がありますが……

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_103<tab>I fear that such an existence cannot sustain itself indefinitely. Look to the Ascians' example─their persistent use of flesh-and-blood vessels surely hath cause.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_103アシエンが顕現の際、必ず人の身体を依代にしていたことを思うと、
魂の状態で活動し続けることには、何らかのリスクがあるはずです。
第一世界での私たちが、数年で限界を迎えたように……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_104<tab>Be it danger akin to that which would have befallen us had we not returned to the Source, I know not─but the time may come when the boy requireth a fully corporeal form.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_104ですから、いずれはあの少年が肉体を得る方法を、
探る必要が出てくるかと思われます……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_105<tab>Should this come to pass, I trust that thou shalt come to his aid.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_105ともかく、第一世界での魂の実体化については、
魂の専門家たる、「ベーク＝ラグ」殿に相談するのが良いでしょう。
彼はクリスタリウムの博物陳列館に入り浸っているはずです。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_106<tab>For the moment, however, thou needst only convey the spirit vessel to Beq Lugg. Farewell...both of thee.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_URIANGER_000_106それでは、私は己が務めに戻りましょう。
彼の旅路に幸あらんことを……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_150<tab>Back again, are you? I'm flattered that you've grown so fond of Norvrandt─or I would be, but you have that expression you lot always wear when you're about to ask me for something...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_150誰かと思えば、おぬしか。
もうこの世界が恋しくなって戻ってきおったのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_151<tab>You did <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_151なんと！
原初世界から運んできた魂を実体化させたいとな！？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_152<tab>After all of the perils your friends faced, and the labors we undertook to return them to your world, you've brought another soul across the rift? Have you no common sense?
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_152ついこの間まで、おぬしの仲間たちを原初世界に戻すため、
あれほど四苦八苦させおったというのに、
今度は、新たに運んできたと！？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_Q3_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A3_000_001<tab>Nope!
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A3_000_001<tab>ごめんなさい

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A3_000_002<tab>It's fiiine. Just work your magic! Magicks. Whichever.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A3_000_002<tab>早く実体化して

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_154<tab>...Clearly. Nevertheless, for my own peace of mind, I'll assume you have a compelling reason for this.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_154ぬ…………まぁ良い。
おぬしが連れてきたとなれば、それなりの事情はあるのだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_155<tab>There had better be a very compelling reason for all of this, whelp.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_155これ！　親しき仲にも礼儀ありという言葉を知らんのか？
まぁ良い……おぬしが連れてきたとなれば、
それなりの事情はあるのだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_156<tab>Removing spirit from vessel will be easy enough, I suppose.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_156皆の魂を実体化させた手法については、
水晶公から聞き及んでおるでな。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_157<tab>However, it requires a few moments without your breathing down my neck. Also, your friend is unlikely to materialize with clothes on, so I doubt they'll want an audience. You should wait here─perhaps take the opportunity for some self-reflection?
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_157しかし、実体化すれば一糸まとわぬ姿で現れる。
何者だろうと、裸で登場はさすがに恥ずかしかろう。
どこかで待ち合わせたいが……？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_158<tab>Oh, very well. At least I tried. We'll find you at the Wandering Stairs directly, then.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_158ふむ、彷徨う階段亭の給仕と引き合わせたいと？
ならば、その「サイエラ」とかいう者のところで、
待っておるがいい。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_200<tab>You want me to speak with someone? Very well─you've done the same at my request often enough.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_200なに？
私に会わせたい人物がいる、だと？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_201<tab>How long are we meant to wait for this friend of yours? I do have work to do, you know.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_201それで？
いつになったら現れるんだ？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_202<tab>Ah, here you are. Pardon the delay─it took some time to acquire robes of an appropriate size.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_202待たせたな。
思ったよりも衣装の調達に手間取ってしまった。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_203<tab>Is this them?
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_203ン・モゥ族……？
これが、君が会わせたいという人物か……？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_204<tab>Cylva!
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_204<tab>やぁ、貴方がシルヴァさん、ですね。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_205<tab>Wh─ Unukalhai!?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_205<tab>まさか……ウヌクアルハイ、なのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_206<tab>Indeed, it is I. Trust me─I can hardly believe that I'm here myself!
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_206ええ。
まさかこうして再会するとは思っていませんでした。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_207<tab>I should think so! When I sent <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> to ask after you, it never occurred to me that you might be able to cross the rift without Ascian aid...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_207それはそうだろう。
アシエンの介在なくして、次元の狭間を渡ることなど、
本来はそう簡単にできることではないのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_Q3_100_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_Q3_100_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A3_100_001<tab>No mysterious mask?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A3_100_001<tab>仮面をつけなくていいのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A3_100_002<tab>Lost your taste for subterfuge, I see.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A3_100_002<tab>素顔を見せていいのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_100_207<tab>My choices and my reasons are my own, now.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_100_207僕はこの世界で、自分に何ができるのかを探したい。
それは誰に命令されたわけでもなく、自ら望んだこと……！

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_200_207<tab>If I am to have faith in them─in myself─I cannot hide who I am.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_200_207<tab>だからもう、己の心を覆い隠す仮面は必要ないんです。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_208<tab>Speaking of which...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_208……道すがら、少年から、
ある程度の事情は聞いておったが……。
酒場の給仕が、異世界の英雄候補とは驚かされたぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_100_208<tab>Unukalhai was kind enough to fill me in─unlike <var 1A 02 /var>some<var 1A 01 /var>─and I was interested to hear of an erstwhile hero of the Thirteenth serving libations at the Wandering Stairs. But that this hero should be <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> surpasses the scope of even my considerable imaginings!
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_100_208<tab>まさかそれが、あの時の冒険者だったとは思いもせんかったが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_100_209<tab>Was that you at Gruenes Licht? So long ago?
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_100_209そうか……。
君はフッブート王国の城で会った……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_200_208<tab>Not so long to me...or you, mayhap. Though I had thought I might at last put those days behind me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_200_208ワシらのように長生きしていると、
忘れたくとも忘れられない思い出ばかりが増えていく。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_400_208<tab>...But perhaps this is for the best. They're not all bad memories.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_400_208だが、それも悪いことばかりではないのかもしれぬ……
最近は、そう思えるようになった。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_500_209<tab>They never are.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_500_209<tab>そうかも、な……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_300_208<tab>I should very much like to hear <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> story─should you be willing to share it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_300_208話の腰を折ってすまぬ。
それでは本題に入ろう。
第十三世界について、詳しく教えてもらえるか？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_200_209<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_200_209<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_209<tab>Our world, like this one, had its share of would-be heroes, myself and Unukalhai among them. Unlike your Warriors of Light, however, each was unaware of─or unconcerned with─our fellows.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_209第十三世界には、私たちの他にも、幾人もの英雄候補がいた。
だが、彼らは蛮神の力を封じた「聖石」という安易な力に手を出し、
次々と「闇」に呑まれていった。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_210<tab>But to fight alone is to fall alone, and the insidious aether of the auracite used to seal primals corrupted once-noble souls and turned them, one by one, to Darkness.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_210それでも抗う道を選んだ者はいたが、
互いに存在を知らぬまま、孤独に戦い続けて敗れたんだ。
そして死にゆく魂を、アシエンに掬い上げられた……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_211<tab>Even those who resisted this fate could not escape its consequences─no surprise, perhaps, as we continued to struggle in solitude. We were spared by Ascian machinations...but only as our world met its death.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_211もしもあの時、互いに信じ合える友が、
背中を預けて戦える仲間がいたら、結果は違っていたかもしれない。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_212<tab>...But what if that death could be undone? I was told that much of the First was consumed by Light, as our home was by Darkness, yet balance and life are being restored to even that scoured land they call “the Empty.”
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_212第一世界では、光の氾濫に呑みこまれた「無の大地」が、
再生に向かいつつあるという話を聞きました。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_213<tab>...But what if that death could be undone? I was told that much of the First was consumed by Light, as our home was by Darkness, yet the night has returned to this world.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_213第一世界では、停滞を示す光に包まれた世界に、
夜の闇が戻ったという話を聞きました。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_214<tab>If such a thing is possible, then why not the reverse? Could we not bring Light back to the Thirteenth?
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_214ならば、闇の氾濫に浸食された第十三世界にだって、
希望の兆しはあるのではないでしょうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_215<tab>Even the Ascians considered the Thirteenth lost. Thus was it excluded from the Rejoining...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_215しかし、あのアシエンたちですら、第十三世界を壊れたゴミと称し、
鏡像世界統合の計画外に置いていたんだぞ？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_216<tab>But what say you? You have a way of making miracles happen.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_216そんな世界を再生するなど……可能なのか……？
君はどう思う？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_Q4_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A4_000_001<tab>Anything is possible.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A4_000_001<tab>可能性はある！

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A4_000_002<tab>The World of Darkness was not in a state I'd consider salvageable.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A4_000_002<tab>「闇の世界」は酷い有様だった

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_218<tab>That doesn't sound like an empty platitude, coming from you. It was the same with Ardbert...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_218君にそう言われると、不思議とあり得る気がしてくる。
アルバートも、そうやって私たちを焚き付けたものだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_219<tab>You speak almost as though you've really seen it. Wait...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_219君は、第十三世界にも渡ったことがあるのか！？
そ、そうか……本当にどこにでも顔を出す奴だな、君は……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_220<tab>Pardon the interruption, but might I suggest a closer examination of conditions on the Thirteenth before we form any conclusions?
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_220ふむ、部外者ではあるがワシが思うに、
現状を正しく把握せん限り、対策も立てようがなかろう。
まずは第十三世界とやらを覗き見てはどうだね？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_Q5_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_Q5_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A5_000_001<tab>How would we go about that safely?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A5_000_001<tab>何か心当たりが？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A5_000_002<tab>We could use the Crystal Tower to open a voidgate, couldn't we? Please?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A5_000_002<tab>クリスタルタワーの力でヴォイドゲートを開こう！

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_222<tab>Have you lost your head!? The Crystal Tower is <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> a toy, and you are <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> to use it to unleash great and terrible voidsent upon this world!
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_222あの塔の何たるかは、記録を調べて知っておるが、
そんなことをすれば魔王級の妖異に、この世界が侵略されるぞ！？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_223<tab>According to the records, there was a group who worked out how to open small voidgates, through which to summon minor fell beasts and the like. Magicks of that nature should work, though I am unsure if any with knowledge of the original technique yet live...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_223過去には、ここ第一世界にも次元の穴を穿ち、
魔物を召喚する術を研究していた集団がおったそうだが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_Q6_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_Q6_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A6_000_001<tab>That sounds familiar...
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A6_000_001<tab>その生き残りに覚えがある

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A6_000_002<tab>There's one right over there.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_A6_000_002<tab>テイナーのこと？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_225<tab>How fortunate! Let us inquire with this “Taynor” immediately.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_225すばらしい！
その「テイナー」という少年の力を借りれば、
あるいは第十三世界を観測することも可能なのでは！？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_226<tab>Yes, you do that. In the meantime, I will ready a means for peering into the depths of the void without endangering ourselves. Use these to contact me when you're prepared to open the gate.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_226では、ワシは観測方法を検討しておくとしようか……。
連絡用に「ひそひ草」を渡しておくゆえ、
進展があったら呼んでくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_100_226<tab>We shall─at the very first opportunity, I promise!
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_100_226ベーク＝ラグさん、ありがとうございます。
僕も、精いっぱいできることをします。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_230<tab>If you've no inclination to explain yourself further, begone with you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_230彷徨う階段亭の給仕と引き合わせたいと？
ならば、その「サイエラ」とかいう者のところで、
待っておるがいい。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TAYNOR_000_250<tab>It's always a pleasure, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TAYNOR_000_250あれ、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
今日はどうしたんですか？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CERIGG_000_251<tab>Aye. But who's your friend? I don't believe we've met.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CERIGG_000_251横にいるのは、給仕係の姉ちゃんと……
ここいらじゃ見ない少年だな。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_252<tab>We have not, as I'm not from this world. The situation is rather complicated, but I hope that you might be willing to assist me...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_252ええ、僕はこの世界の人間ではないのです。
実は……

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TAYNOR_000_253<tab>Hmm. It is true that we had the means to open such portals.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TAYNOR_000_253なるほど……。
確かに、ぼくは次元の壁に穴を開けて、
遠くの世界から魔物を召喚する術の修行をしていました。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TAYNOR_000_254<tab>We call them “hollows,” and it was through one of these that I was drawn into the rift...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TAYNOR_000_254その結果、「虚ろ」と呼ばれる穴の中に吸い込まれ、
次元の狭間に閉じこめられてしまったんです。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_255<tab>So it is possible!
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_255<tab>では、第十三世界への扉を開くことが……！

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TAYNOR_000_256<tab>Not with my power alone. I understand the greatness of your need, and were Nyelbert still at my side, I should be glad to make the attempt, but the technique required the combined force of our energies in resonance.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TAYNOR_000_256ぼくの魔力だけでは、異世界に届くほどの穴は開けられません。
あれはナイルベルトとふたり、力を合わせたからできたこと。
彼がいない今では、もう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_257<tab>If one person's magicks are insufficient, perhaps I could assist. From what I can sense, our aetherial reserves are roughly equivalent, and our physical similarities suggest that our energies are not incompatible...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_257では、僕の力を使ってくれませんか？
見たところ僕とテイナーさんは、肉体的な年齢も、魔力の量も近い。
息を合わせる練習をすれば、上手くいくかもしれません！

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TAYNOR_000_258<tab>I fear you underestimate the difficulty of the task. Nyelbert and I were born for this, and even so, it took us years before our efforts were perfectly in step.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TAYNOR_000_258それでも今すぐに、というのは難しいと思います……。
僕とナイルベルトは、あの術を使うまで、
どれだけの修行を積んだか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_100_258<tab>I realize that it's a lot to ask considering that we've just met, but could we not at least attempt it?
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_100_258いきなり現れて力を貸せだなんて、
失礼なお願いだというのはわかっています。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_200_258<tab>Yours is the only such magic I've ever heard of, and if we might actually be able to save my home...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_200_258それでも、いまの僕には貴方や、
皆さんの力を頼るほか術がないのです……！
故郷を取り戻すためには……

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_259<tab>May I interject?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_259<tab>話に割って入ってすまないが……

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_260<tab>You will recall that the crystals in my possession preserve the memories of the former Warriors of Light, including Nyelbert's, in aetherial form.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_260私が預かっている英雄たちのクリスタルには、
微かだが彼らの記憶の残滓が遺っていた。
「光の戦士たち」の強い想いが定着しているのだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_261<tab>And Unukalhai here has a particular talent for interpreting the minds and motives of aetherial beings─the primals.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_261ところでウヌクアルハイ、
君はたしか蛮神の思考を読み取る力を持っていたはずだな？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_262<tab>If I could apply the same principles to interpret Nyelbert's crystal...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_262……そうか！
あれがエーテルから意志や記憶を読む力だとすれば、
クリスタルに遺されたものだって……！

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_263<tab>An experiment worth trying, at the least. I'll fetch it.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_263<tab>では、クリスタルを準備する。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_264<tab>Speak to me, Nyelbert...
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_264<tab>これが、第一世界の英雄の記憶……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_265<tab>Do his memories of training with Taynor remain?
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_265<tab>どうだ、術に関する記憶はあったか？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_266<tab>They do... And such strong sentiment with them...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_266こ、これは…………！
なんという……なんという、強い想いなのか…………！

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_267<tab>Taynor... You should know that Nyelbert desired nothing so much as to rescue you, his dearest friend. He held so fiercely to his memories of the technique you mastered together because he hoped they might be your salvation.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_267結論から言えば、術式は記憶として焼き付いていました。
ひとりの友を……テイナーさんを救いたいという、
強い強い焦げ付くような想いとともに……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TAYNOR_000_268<tab>Oh, Nyelbert. I...
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TAYNOR_000_268<tab>ナイルベルト…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TAYNOR_000_269<tab>...I won't let them go to waste. I will do what I can to help see the Thirteenth restored.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_TAYNOR_000_269わかりました……ぼくでよければ協力します。
いえ、協力させてください。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_100_269<tab>Thank you.
target: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_100_269<tab>ありがとう、テイナーさん……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CERIGG_000_270<tab>I won't pretend I understand the half of what's going on here. Just keep them from running headlong into anything too dangerous, will you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CERIGG_000_270相変わらず、魔法関係の会話はよくわからないんだが……
あんまり危険な真似はさせられないぞ？

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CERIGG_000_271<tab>Nothing to worry about so long as you're around, I'm sure.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CERIGG_000_271ふむ、お前がしっかり面倒を見てくれるってんなら安心か。
だとしたら、本人にやる気がある以上、
俺が口を挟むことじゃないな。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_272<tab>Wicked white! I nearly forgot─I've half a dozen orders to fill. You know where to find me when you've made progress with the gate.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_272修行に進捗があったら知らせてくれ。
これ以上、酒場の仕事を放り出すわけにはいかないのでな。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_275<tab>What a fascinating place to spend one's days. I should love to hear more about the patrons that have passed through.
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_UNUKALHAI_000_275それにしても、まさかシルヴァが、
酒場の給仕係をしているだなんて……。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_280<tab>He really hasn't aged a day! Not that it should surprise me, of all people, but...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_CYELLA_000_280ウヌクアルハイの容姿が、相変わらず幼いのは、
魂を実体化させているからだろうな。

source: TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_285<tab>I do so enjoy a new project...
target:
TEXT_LUCKUN001_03986_BEQLUGG_000_285ワシは第十三世界の観測方法を検討しておく。
進展があったら、連絡用に渡した「ひそひ草」で呼んでくれ。
